channel.title: C/++ (SDL & OpenGL) - LFT - Programmers!
channel.description:
[b]My Introduction[/b] Hello. I have been game-programming for almost 3 years and I want to make a game. Rather than writing non-reusable code, I'd rather write an engine with a team. The reason why I want a team is because I feel writing one by myself will result with only failure. I have a few game concepts in my head; all of these concepts can be used to create multiple games. I've written a few simple games like Pong, Snake, Frogger, Tetris, and a shitty, unfinished pokemon clone.
[b]Who I am looking for[/b] I don't really expect much from whomever wants to help. Maybe just that you have a good programming background. Please note that I am writing in C/++ with SDL/OpenGL. Oh, and time isn't really essential because I understand a lot of you are busy with college and school as I am, so if you can only pull in a few hours a day to help, that's completely fine.
Helper Application: [code] Contact (Skype or MSN): [/code]
I might test you to see if you know what you are doing.

item.title: C/++ (SDL & OpenGL) - LFT - Programmers!
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

[quote=“Pazaz, post:4, topic:424308”][quote author=lemme_winks_ link=topic=526961.msg3846070#msg3846070 date=1323633234]

I’ll be willing to reformat your post, if you wish.
And I prefer SDL, But that’s me.

Oh, And…
Email: TheMaleScripter@live.com
Skype: ps3playerr

EDIT----
I have a basic update of your post (Modify to your will) at Pastebin

assuming u wanted to help i added both of your contacts
[/quote]

Alright. You should update your post with the link I gave you, And also - I accepted your MSN Request thing.[/quote]
no reason to at the moment because i havent written a lot of the engine yet. i did nothing this weekend because i was out. this week ill try to get a lot done.

edit: i am writing with sdl as my graphics api so illl edit the first post

Read full topic

@lemme_winks wrote:

My Introduction
Hello. I have been game-programming for almost 3 years and I want to make a game. Rather than writing non-reusable code, I’d rather write an engine with a team. The reason why I want a team is because I feel writing one by myself will result with only failure. I have a few game concepts in my head; all of these concepts can be used to create multiple games. I’ve written a few simple games like Pong, Snake, Frogger, Tetris, and a shitty, unfinished pokemon clone.

Who I am looking for
I don’t really expect much from whomever wants to help. Maybe just that you have a good programming background. Please note that I am writing in C/++ with SDL/OpenGL. Oh, and time isn’t really essential because I understand a lot of you are busy with college and school as I am, so if you can only pull in a few hours a day to help, that’s completely fine.
